title: Store Problems.
body:
Hello, I bought a $25 Dollar RP Card yesterday, (Yes I activated it.) And I entered it into the store, and it gave me the error of something like, "We are sorry the store is unable to process your request at this time, please try again later." I tried so many times, after waiting about 1hr, 30 min and now I cant even put it in for another 24hrs. I'm very worried. Please help. 

PS. It says if you get this error, its a problem of the store, not me.

replies.body: why dont you give me the code and i'll try it? Just kidding, anyway have you tried both the legacy client and the updated? i've never had that issue before
Yeah, I buy A LOT of rp, i've never had this happen to me. I did try in both clients, still the same error. ):

Since you're seeing this error on both Clients, I recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our billing specialists can assist you in sorting this out. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
Hi! Thanks for the help, but it started working after 24hrs! Perhaps it was a silly bug. ^_^
